headline: Johnson Controls International (JCI) Unveils New Thermal Management Solutions for Data Centers
summary: Johnson Controls International (JCI) recently launched the Silent-Aire Coolant Distribution Unit, enhancing its data center offerings and addressing rising demand for efficient thermal management solutions. This innovation could have aligned well with the 3% price move observed over the last quarter. Among other developments, the company announced a quarterly dividend and expanded its buyback plan, boosting investor confidence. Earnings performance showed mixed results with rising revenue but...

headline: Johnson Controls expands thermal management offering with scalable liquid cooling solution to meet the increasing demand of high-density data centers
summary: Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), the global leader in smart, safe, healthy and sustainable buildings, has expanded its data center thermal management offerings with the launch of its Silent-Aire Coolant Distribution Unit (CDU) platform. This latest addition to Johnson Controls' end-to-end thermal management portfolio enables data centers to seamlessly transition to liquid cooling as rack densities rise. The Silent-Aire CDUs offer a wide range of scalable cooling capacities from 500kW to over 10MW i

headline: Physical Security Industry Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Johnson Controls, Bosch, and Honeywell Lead with Smart Platforms, AI Analytics, and Global Expansions
summary: Gain valuable insights with the Physical Security Companies Quadrant, a detailed industry analysis spotlighting the top 23 leaders in the global physical security market. This comprehensive report evaluates over 100 key players, including Johnson Controls, Bosch Building Technologies, and Honeywell, focusing on technological innovations, market strategies, and the integration of cybersecurity.
